error404.heading: Error 404
error404.before-link: The page you were looking for couldn't be found. Click
error404.after-link: to return to the home page.

index.heading: Home
index.hometext1: Welcome to the homepage of the opensource Pollution Detection System. This system uses the Planet API for map images and your own sensorhubs for the Pollution details. Visit our github for details about the sensorhubs. https://github.com/PLA25/Sensors
index.hometext2: The full documentation for the website can be found here: https://github.com/PLA25/Website/tree/master/docs
index.hometext3: The homepage text can be edited in the language files (Location: locals/en for English and locales/nl for Dutch) and the index.hbs file. (Location: views/indes.hbs)
